data.text:
@R_H_Ebright @TheSeeker268 https://t.co/XCU6ZSMOag
It seems someone is pointing again at the market

@R_H_Ebright @VBruttel @AllergyDisease @TheSeeker268 Simple:

Stop rewarding coffer suckers like you with tax payers hard earned $s for your exotic projects

@IsabellWelpe @R_H_Ebright @AllergyDisease @TheSeeker268 @Adriano_Mannino @CD57227 @ch_zimmer @dfg_public @Leopoldina @BMBF_Bund @c_drosten If anybody wants to help with the webpage (needs proof reading!), write translations, produce e.g. YouTube videos, contact reporters, or update Wikipedia, please contact me/Just do so! Twitter won't Help here, I don't have enough time.

@IsabellWelpe @R_H_Ebright @AllergyDisease @TheSeeker268 @Adriano_Mannino @CD57227 @ch_zimmer @dfg_public @Leopoldina @BMBF_Bund Yes, this is all correct, see Hamburg Declaration. Both SARS2 and Omicron came from a lab, see https://t.co/A8oyxdevkR . But german media almost exclusively listens to @c_drosten, the one German person with the most COI. It's absurd. We must keep fighting the disinformation!
@CD57227 @IsabellWelpe @AllergyDisease @TheSeeker268 @Adriano_Mannino @VBruttel @ch_zimmer @dfg_public @Leopoldina @BMBF_Bund Their intent now, as in the past, has been for it not to work.

@IsabellWelpe @R_H_Ebright @AllergyDisease @TheSeeker268 @Adriano_Mannino @VBruttel @ch_zimmer @dfg_public @Leopoldina @BMBF_Bund Absolutely. If a nuclear plant leaks, physicists know which isotopes to expect. But if a biolab is suspected to have leaked, biologists are like, "Well, how are we supposed to know what to look for? Nobody knows what they've been working on. Guess we'll never know then!"

@CD57227 @R_H_Ebright @AllergyDisease @TheSeeker268 @Adriano_Mannino @VBruttel @ch_zimmer @dfg_public @Leopoldina @BMBF_Bund Exactly. I do think the field of virology (or large parts thereof) has not set an example of leadership committed to the principles of science and scientific investigation. What a striking difference to physics and nuclear technology.

@IsabellWelpe @R_H_Ebright @AllergyDisease @TheSeeker268 @Adriano_Mannino @VBruttel @ch_zimmer @dfg_public @Leopoldina @BMBF_Bund And if nobody is willing to discuss the risks, how is self-regulation supposed to work??

@IsabellWelpe @R_H_Ebright @AllergyDisease @TheSeeker268 @Adriano_Mannino @VBruttel @ch_zimmer @dfg_public @Leopoldina @BMBF_Bund I'd say no, because in the exchanges around #OriginOfCovid so far, I can't remember anybody who's working in the field of virus research with pandemic potential was even willing to discuss the risks involved.
